Mewdeko Docs

Namespace Mewdeko.Services

Namespaces

Mewdeko.Services.Common
Mewdeko.Services.Impl
Mewdeko.Services.Settings
Mewdeko.Services.Strings.Impl
Mewdeko.Services.strings

Classes

CommandHandler

Handles command parsing and execution, integrating with various services to process Discord interactions and messages.

DbConfig

Represents configuration for the database.

GreetSettings

Represents the greeting settings for a guild, including configurations for greeting and farewell messages, both in channels and via direct messages (DM), as well as settings for boost messages.

GreetSettingsService

Provides services for managing greeting settings and executing greetings and farewells in guilds.

GuildSettingsService

Service for managing guild settings.

LogSetup

Class responsible for setting up the logger configuration.

RestartConfig

Represents configuration for restarting the bot.

ShardStatus

Represents the status of a shard.

StandardConversions

Provides standard conversion methods.

Interfaces

IBotCredentials

Represents credentials required for the bot's functionality.

ICoordinator

Interface for coordinating bot actions and retrieving shard information.

IDataCache

Represents a data cache interface.

IGoogleApiService

Represents a service for interacting with the Google API.

IImageCache

Interface for managing and accessing cached images.

ILocalDataCache

Represents a cache for local data.

ILocalization

Interface for managing localization settings.

INService

Interface that all services must implement in order to be auto-discovered by the dependency injection system.

IStatsService

Interface for a service responsible for providing various statistics.

IUnloadableService

Interface implemented by services that require cleanup after they are unloaded.
